summary: Provides an example implementation of the MoNet graph neural network using DGL and MXNet to perform node classification on standard citation graph datasets such as Cora, Citeseer, and Pubmed, including data handling, model construction with GMMConv layers, and training/evaluation utilities.
business_intent: Showcase how to apply the MoNet architecture for graph-based learning tasks, offering a ready-to-run reference for researchers and developers interested in geometric deep learning on citation networks.
